title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 843/98 of 22 April 1998 amending Council Regulation (EC) No 2200/97 as regards the breakdown between the Member States of areas under apple trees, pear trees, peach trees and nectarine trees for which grubbing-up premiums can be granted
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 843/98 of 22 April 1998 amending Council Regulation (EC) No 2200/97 as regards the breakdown between the Member States of areas under apple trees, pear trees, peach trees and nectarine trees for which grubbing-up premiums can be granted
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The table in Article 1(2) of Regulation (EC) No 2200/97 is hereby replaced by the following.
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 April 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 303, 6. 11. 1997, p. 3.
